title: Boston celebrity chef Tiffani Faison to open a 'giant' Tenderoni's in Fenway
dc:creator: WBUR
description: "It's going to look like a tricked-out roller rink," she said. Plus, Faison talks about her passion for lifting women up in the restaurant industry.
